divy24:7: bhikṣuvaḥ saṁśayajātāḥ sarvasaṁśayacchettāraṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—kuto bhadanta tena nāgakumāreṇa tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā? bhagavānāha—bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣuvo ’sminneva bhadrakalpe viṁśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṁ kāśyapo nāma śāstā lokam utpannastathāgato ’rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṁ buddho bhagavān |
divy24:8: sa evaṁ śrāvakāṇāṁ dharmaṁ deśayati—etāni bhikṣavo ’raṇyāni śūnyāgārāṇi parvatakandaragiriguhāpalālapuñjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni dhyāyata |
divy24:12: tatra kecidbhikṣavaḥ sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāṁ gatvā dhyāyanti, kecinmandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇyāstīre, kecidanavatapte mahāsarasi, kecit saptasu kāñcanamayeṣu parvateṣu, kecit tāsu tāsu grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānīṣu gatvā dhyāyanti |
divy24:14: anyatamaśca cirajātako nāgakumāraḥ suparṇinā pakṣirājena sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāmupariṣṭādapahriyate |
divy24:15: yāvat tena bhikṣavo dhyānādhyayanayogamanasikārayuktā viharanto dṛṣṭāḥ |
divy24:17: prasādajātaḥ saṁlakṣayati—muktā hyete āryakā evaṁvidhād duḥkhāt |
divy24:18: cyutaḥ kālagato vārāṇasyāṁ ṣaṭkarmanirate brāhmaṇakule jātaḥ |
divy24:20: so ’pareṇa samayena kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitaḥ |
divy24:25: kutra mama mātāpitarau? yāvat paśyati nāgabhavane rudantau tiṣṭhataḥ |
divy24:27: gatvā pṛcchitumārabdhah—amba tāta kasyārthe ruditah? tau kathayatah—ārya, sucirajātako ’smākaṁ nāgakumāraḥ suparṇinā pakṣirājenāpahṛtaḥ |
divy24:29: ārya, tādṛśaḥ sa duṣṭānāgo yadvayaṁ sugatigamanamapi na saṁbhāvayāmaḥ, prāgevedṛśānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ lābhī bhaviṣyati |
divy24:31: pādayor nipatya kathayatah—ārya, evaṁvidhāstvayā guṇagaṇā adhigatāḥ |
divy24:33: ihaiva tvamāgamya divase divase bhaktakṛtyaṁ kṛtvā gaccha |
divy24:34: sa nāgabhavane divyāṁ sudhāṁ paribhuktvā āgacchati |
divy24:36: sa bhikṣubhiruktah—śrāmaṇeraka, ayaṁ te upādhyāyaḥ kutra bhuktvā āgacchati? sa kathayati—nāhaṁ jāne |
divy24:37: te kathayanti—nāgabhavane divyāṁ sudhāṁ paribhujya pāribhujyāgacchati |
divy24:38: tvaṁ kasyārthe na gacchati? sa kathayati—ayaṁ maharddhiko mahānubhāvo yena gacchati |
divy24:39: kathamahaṁ gacchāmi? te kathayanti—yadā ayam ṛddhyā gacchati, tadā tvamasya cīvarakarṇikaṁ gṛhāṇa |
divy24:41: te kathayanti—bhadramukha, yadi sumeruḥ parvatarājā cīvarakarṇikamavalambate, nāsau patet, prāgeva tvaṁ patiṣyasīti |
divy24:42: yo yasmin sthāne ’ntardhāsyati, tena tatra nimittamudgṛhītam |
divy24:45: tau upari vihāyasā prakrāntau yāvat tau nāgairdṛṣṭau |
divy24:48: sa saṁlakṣayati—kasyārthe ’yamapara āsanaḥ prajñaptah? sa pratinivartya paśyati yāvat śrāmaṇerakam |
divy24:54: taistasya divyā sudhā dattā, tasyāpi prākṛta āhāraḥ |
divy24:56: tena tasya pātraṁ gṛhītam yāvat tatraikā odanamijya(?) vatiṣṭhate |
divy24:59: ekadhye niṣaṇṇayorasya divyā sudhā dattā, mamāpi prākṛta āhāraḥ |
divy24:60: sa praṇidhānaṁ kartumārabdhah—yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksambuddhe ’nuttare mahādakṣiṇīye brahmacaryaṁ cīrṇam, anenāhaṁ kuśalamūlenaitaṁ nāgamasmādbhavanāccyāvayitvā atraivopapadyeyamiti |
divy24:61: tasya dṛṣṭa eva dharme ubhābhyāṁ pāṇibhyāṁ jalaṁ syanditumārabdham |
divy24:65: sa kathayati—bhadramukha, apāyā hyete, nivartaya cittam |
divy24:66: sa gāthāṁ bhāṣate— pravaṇībhūutamidaṁ cittaṁ na śaknomi nivārayitum |
divy24:67: ihasthasyaiva me bhadanta pāṇibhyāṁ syandate jalam (1)|
divy24:69: tatra bhikṣavastena nāgakumāreṇa tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā |
